Hi I am from Chile, South America and I would like to present myself in the formus, I play Kerbal space program since it was at 0.17 but I wanted the game since 0.16 so in that time I would play with the old demo, when I found the game the name just made me laugh, and I found it really interesting and quite awsome cause I really love Physics and Astronomy, the idea of creating your rocket, launching it, making an orbit in real big rendered planet, and landing anywhere you want was pretty amazing for me, I also think is a really good way of learning about orbital mechanics if you have time enough, I must spend like 1200 hours on kerbal space program ( having 400 hours on steam). Is good to add that this is a really reputated game, because it might be dificult for some people who dont have experience with previous flight simulator games and you really need to be good to have really stupid thing that might seem easy in other games, I hope this game grows up so it can be more amazing of what is now.

I am quite fan of Kerbal Space Program
